oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Exhibit displays at the Metropolitan Nashville Government seventh anniversary breakfast, Nashville, Tennessee, 1970 April 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exhibit display featuring the Metropolitan Police Department in honor of the 7th Anniversary of the consolidation of Metropolitan Nashville and Davidson County Government, at a breakfast held on April 1st, 1970. This was the first consolidation of a city and a county government in the nation, merging in 1963. Beverly Briley was elected the first mayor of the consolidated government, and he served in that capacity from 1963 to 1975. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : col. ; 3.5 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
